thread.title: BRIEF-National United Resources Says ‍Tian Songlin Resigned As Executive Director​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-National United Resources Says ‍Tian Songlin Resigned As Executive Director​

organizations.name: reuters) - national united resources holdings ltd

text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - National United Resources Holdings Ltd :
* ‍TIAN SONGLIN RESIGNED AS AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR​ * ‍ TIAN SONGLIN RESIGNED AS AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR​ * ‍TIAN SONGLIN ALSO RESIGNED FROM ALL OF HIS POSITIONS AT ALL SUBSIDIARIES AND BRANCHES OF COMPANY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
